page_content: The page discusses travel recommendations for the Berner Zibelemärit event, advising the use of public transportation.
The page discusses an open day for an archaeological excavation site in Court-Chaluet, offering guided tours in German and French.
The page provides information on the disposal of municipal waste, responsibilities, and guidelines for special waste types.
The page discusses noise reduction measures in construction and urban planning, focusing on the importance of soundproofing in building projects.
The page discusses traffic disruptions in the Wankdorf area due to an Imagine Dragons concert and recommends using public transportation.
The page discusses traffic and parking restrictions in Bern during the Zibelemärit event and recommends using public transportation.
